com.io7m.jspatial

Class Dimensions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.jspatial.Dimensions

  • public final class Dimensions
extends Object
    Functions to calculate dimensions and spans.

      • getSpanSizeX

        public static int getSpanSizeX(com.io7m.jtensors.VectorReadable2IType lower,
                               com.io7m.jtensors.VectorReadable2IType upper)
        Return the span on the X axis of the inclusive range defined by the given points.
        Parameters:
        lower - The lower point
        upper - The upper point
        Returns:
        upper.getXI() - lower.getXI()) + 1

        Returns:

      • split1D

        public static void split1D(int low,
                           int high,
                           int[] out)

        Given an inclusive range defined by [low .. high], split the range in the middle and produce two new inclusive ranges.

        The lower and upper bounds of the lower range are stored in out[0] and out[1], respectively. The lower and upper bounds of the upper range are stored in out[2] and out[3], respectively.

        Parameters:
        low - The lower bound
        high - The upper bound
        out - The output vector
